definitions.definition: involving many people or things, especially over a wide area

examples.text: Large areas of the forest will be cleared for ranching as part of a large-scale development plan.
the large-scale manufacturing of the vaccine
The proposals include large-scale investment in agriculture and industry.
These measures would facilitate the development of large-scale business enterprises.

definitions.definition: drawn or made to a scale that shows a small area of land or a building in great detail
